remarks: The recurring decimal 0.999..., which is defined as the infinite sum 0.9 + 0.09 + 0.009 + ... i.e. ` 9 / 10 ^ 1 + 9 / 10 ^ 2 + 9 / 10 ^ 3 + ... ` , is exactly equal to 1, according to ZF set theory.  Interestingly, about 40% of the people responding to a poll at ~ http://forum.physorg.com/index.php?showtopic=13177 disagree. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2007.)
